(I;ve been asleep all day so here is my first post)

:::Thunder Hammer:::

Thunder Hamer was hidden in the shadows of the Bridge waiting for his new 
companions. when the doors slid open and his buddies came in. He looked as 
Black Aracnia gave Rampage the altimatuem. He slowly rose out of the shadows 
and put his arm cannon to the back of Rampage. Thunder Hammer looked at 
Black Aracnia waitng to get a signel to open fire. A smile came across 
Thunder Hammer's face, knowing he had done well.
